description: A representation of See: GA4GH passport visa

value.description: Required. A string that represents any of the scope, process, identifier and version of the assertion. The format of the string can vary by the Visa Type

source.description: Required. A URL Claim that provides at a minimum the organization that made the assertion. If there is no organization making the assertion, the source claim value MUST be set to 'https://no.organization'.

by.description: Optional. The level or type of authority within the 'source' organization of the assertion.
